title: Place the Shrine(s) (C)
text:
Place the Shrine(s) on the indicated hex on the map.

A player that controls a Shrine at the start of a round (step 3 of the Communion Phase) adds a number of Fate to their pool, as per the rules of the selected battlefield map. (See more on Shrines under 'Effigies & Shrines' pg.81.)
